Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pCube
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Cube

Parameters.Name: pSrcView
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Temporary view name for source

Parameters.Name: pTgtView
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Temporary view name for target

Parameters.Name: pFilter
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Filter Unmapped Dimensions using format: Year¦ 2006 + 2007 & Scenario¦ Actual + Budget etc

Parameters.Name: pEleMapping
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Map source elements to target elements using format Dim1ToCopy:SourceElement->TargetElement & Dim2ToCopy:Source Element->TargetElement etc

Parameters.Name: pMappingDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter between source element and target element in pEleMapping  (default value if blank = '->')

Parameters.Name: pDimDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter for start of Dimension/Element set  (default value if blank = '&')

Parameters.Name: pEleStartDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter for start of element list  (default value if blank = '¦')

Parameters.Name: pEleDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter between elements (default value if blank = '+')

Parameters.Name: pFactor
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Multiply source value by factor (1 keeps the value as is). To modify existing values make the target element the same as the source with pZeroTarget = 0

Parameters.Name: pSuppressConsol
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Suppress Consolidated Cells (Skip = 1)

Parameters.Name: pSuppressRules
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Suppress Rules (Skip = 1)

Parameters.Name: pCumulate
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: 1 = Add source to existing value in target (if zero out target = 0 False). 0 = Replace target with source.

Parameters.Name: pZeroTarget
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Zero out Target Element PRIOR to Copy? (Boolean 1=True)

Parameters.Name: pZeroSource
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Zero out Source Element AFTER Copy? (Boolean 1=True)

Parameters.Name: pTemp
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delete temporary view and Subset ( 0 = Retain View and Subsets 1 = Delete View and Subsets 2 = Delete View only )

Parameters.Name: pCubeLogging
Parameters.Prompt: Required: Cube Logging (0 = No transaction logging, 1 = Logging of transactions, 2 = Ignore Cube Logging - No Action Taken)

Parameters.Name: pSandbox
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: To use sandbox not base data enter the sandbox name (invalid name will result in process error)

Parameters.Name: pFile
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Copy via file export and import. Reduces locks (0 = no, 1= use file and delete it 2= use file and retain it)

Parameters.Name: pThreadMode
Parameters.Prompt: DO NOT USE: Internal parameter only, please don't use
